attributes.action: Fund BBC from the lottery and abolish the licence fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC should be funded - either fully or partially - from the National Lottery. The BBC license fee raises £3 billion. The National Lottery raises £5 billion. 

Possibly the BBC should receive £2 billion and raise additional funds (if necessary) via subscription.
